verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--tomāra kartavya, āmāra vacana
nikaṭe āsiyācha tumi, yāha vṛndāvana

synonyms: prabhu kahe—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu replied; tomāra kartavya—your duty; āmāra vacana—My order; nikaṭe āsiyācha—have come near; tumi—you; yāha—go; vṛndāvana—to Vṛndāvana.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu replied, "Your duty is to carry out My order. You have come near Vṛndāvana. Now you should go there.
